name: Shabazz
description: Shabazz is the greatest companion one could ask for. He loves to play with you, and will climb a tree faster than you can say "Lemur"!

name: Patrick
description: Patrick is a starfish caught in the shallow reefs near Australia. He is a very social star, and will sometimes wear green pants.

name: Igor
description: Igor is an Elephant from the great land of Kenya. He loves to swim, and will show you how if you don't already know!

name: Dory
description: Dory is a blue tang caught in the Atlantic Ocean. She is very sweet, but struggles with memory problems.

name: Bread
description: Dory loves this snack. You can also use this for sandwiches.

name: Eggs
description: Eggs are used year round, perfect for breakfast, baking, or frying. Eggs should be in your fridge year round due to their multiple purposes.

name: Muffin
description: Eggs are used year round, perfect for breakfast, baking, or frying. Eggs should be in your fridge year round due to their multiple purposes.

name: Cereal
description: Cereal is a good way to start your day. Milk and cereal commonly go together.
